content.text: My smart oven keeps throwing an F9 error and I need it fixed before hosting dinner tonight. What should I do?

Happy to help. Could you confirm the order number or phone used at purchase so I can check the warranty? Also, when does the F9 error appear and have you rebooted the breaker or checked for loose wiring?
The order was 24118-OVN, still under warranty. The error pops up after preheating, and I only tried unplugging it for a minute.

Thanks, that order is covered. Please power it off at the breaker for five minutes, then reseat the ribbon cable behind the control panel. If the error returns, I can get a technician tomorrow morning - does that fit your timing?
